mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing the mobile navigation bar for smaller screens to improve accessibility.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce the image sizes or implement lazy loading to enhance page load time.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve the use of header tags (H1, H2) and meta descriptions for better SEO ranking.
userExperienceTip: Ensure consistency in button placements and colors to improve visual flow.
bookingFlowTip: Add clearer progress indicators during the booking process to guide users more intuitively.
